sqlMap.statement: SELECT $code$ AS "code", $name$ AS "name" FROM $schemaId$.$tableName$ ORDER BY $name$ ASC
SELECT EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME "code", EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME "name" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHE03 ) AA ORDER BY EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME
SELECT EAISVCNAME AS "code", EAISVCDESC AS "name" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHE01 ORDER BY EAISVCNAME

SELECT VLD_VAL AS "code", VLD_VAL_NM AS "name" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIMX04 WHERE DEL_YN ='N'
UPPER_VLD_VAL = #upperVal#
AND $searchType$ = #param# ORDER BY 1
